original_title: Dinamo: Crvena Zvezda – Domovinski rat počeo je na Maksimiru
overview: A documentary that explores the events of the disrupted football match between Dinamo (Zagreb) and Crvena Zvezda (Beograd) on May 13th 1990. As fighting broke out the match was cancelled and the events are explored with testimonies from members of Bad Blue Boys and the police of the time. The event is considered by many as the start of the Croatian war for independence (Domovinski rat).
title: FC Dinamo: FC Red Star – The War of Liberation Began at Maksimir Stadium
